com.epam.recreation_module.controller

Class OrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.recreation_module.controller.OrderController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/order")
 @CrossOrigin
public class OrderController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class CommentaryController is an endpoint of the API which used for Orders Annotated by RestController with no parameters to provide answer in application/json Annotated by RequestMapping with parameter value = "/order" Annotated by CrossOrigin with no parameters to give permission to connection So that OrderController is accessed by sending requests to /order
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yulchiev Abbos
